Class CityOfHeroes

  • java.lang.Object
    • CityOfHeroes

  • public class CityOfHeroes
extends java.lang.Object
    A city composed of buildings in which the heroes jumps from roof to roof.
    Version:
    (7 of February of 2019)
    Author:
    (Nicolas Aguilera y Daniel Walteros)

        public CityOfHeroes(int cityWidth,

        Constructor for objects of class CityOfHeroes

    • Method Detail

      • addBuilding

        public void addBuilding(int x,
                        int width,
                        int height,
                        int hardness)
        Adds a building into the city, if any dimension of the building gets out of the city or clash with other building doesn´t add it.
        Parameters:
        x - The origin X coordinate of the building.
        width - The width of the building.
        height - The height of the building.
        hardness - The hardness of the building.

      • addHeroe

        public void addHeroe(java.lang.String color,
                     int hidingBuilding,
                     int strength)
        Adds a new hero in the city, a hero of a color that is already in the city cannot be adds.
        Parameters:
        color - A string that represents the color of the hero.
        hidingBuilding - The number of the building in which the hero lives.
        strength - A number that represents the strength of the hero(the maximum strength is 100).

        public java.lang.String[] deads()
        Shows the colors of the heroes that are dead.
        Returns:
        An arrayList showing the colors of the dead heroes.

      • isDamaged

        public boolean isDamaged(int x)
        Knows if the hero get hurt at the jump in one building.
        Parameters:
        x - The coordinate of the building in which the hero are jumping. return A boolean expresion that determines if the hero gets hurt.

      • isSafeJump

        public boolean isSafeJump(java.lang.String heroe,

      • isSafeJump

        public boolean isSafeJump(java.lang.String heroe,
                          int velocity,
                          int angle)
        Verifies if in a jump the hero get hurts or gets intact.
        Parameters:
        heroe - A string that represents the color of the hero.
        velocity - The speed that the hero jumps.
        angle - The angle that the hero jumps.
        slow - A boolean indicating if the jumps sees slow or not.
        Returns:
        The boolean value that represents if the hero gets hurt or get intact.
